MAN.TITLE: xtitle
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: add titles on a graphics window

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : a sequence of statements key1=value1, key2=value2, ... where keys may be boxed (see below). In this case, the order has no special meaning.
: an integer value. If it is 1, a box is drawn around each title.

DESCRIPTION.P: xtitle add titles on a 2D or 3D plot. title is the general title and x_label, y_label and z_label are the titles on the three axis. If the arguments are matrices, each line of the matrices is displayed on a different line.
Enter the command xtitle() to see a demo.
